text.p: Slaughter steers and heifers were fully $0.50 per cwt higher on a live basis; dressed sales were steady to $1.00 higher. Demand and seller interest strong. Confirmed - 20,000 Last Week - 24,000 Last Year - 14,800 Wk To Date- 86,700 Sm Pd Lst Wk- 45,300 Sm Pd Lst Yr- 24,800
Slaughter Steers - Select and Choice 2-3 1225-1300 lbs - 65.00-66.00; dressed basis 105.50-106.00, few early to 104.00 ( weighted average 105.76).
Slaughter Heifers - Select and Choice 2-3 1075-1225 lbs - 65.00-66.00, load 66.50; dressed basis 105.00-106.00. ( weighted average 105.50.
Live basis sales - Equivalent 3 percent shrink delivered and FOB, some FOB 4% shrink. Dressed basis delivered (paid on hot carcass weights).
